=== About me ===
I'm a software developer working for Canonical on the development and delivery of the <nowiki>[[https://cloud-images.ubuntu.com/|Ubuntu cloud images]]</nowiki> for the different clouds and OCI/Docker images. I've been a <nowiki>[[https://nm.debian.org/person/toabctl/|Debian Developer]]</nowiki> until 2019 and I contributed to a <nowiki>[[https://www.openhub.net/accounts/toabctl|lot of different open source projects]]</nowiki>.
